name: Sweet Splash - Christmas Match
description:
Match tasty candy in this fun and challenging 1000+ match-3 adventure!

MAIN FEATURES:
◆ Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
◆ Hundreds of addictive puzzles with more added all the time!
◆ Amazing arsenal of powerups & combos!
◆ Stunning graphics & adorable animations!
developers: Yummy Nature - Casual Game of Star Crush
